comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm afraid I'm the stick figure now... I haven't passed anyone on Flag since 2003 (Mom hasn't been on a bike since). In fact, I've become part of the initiation for several local teams. They call it _tagging the Fred_. Like the [corpse on Mt. Everest,](http://www.nowpublic.com/peace_at_last_for_sleeping_beauty) I've become part of the landscape. To wit: _Proceed around a tight southbound switchback, knock out a short westerly climb, then, just past a lanky, balding cyclist on a silver Clark Kent, make a tight right turn and climb the last 3/4 mile to the summit._ - Boulder Bike Guide, Â©2007 Sure it's humiliating, but The National Registry of Historic Places helps cover some of my overhead, so what the hell... DU
